channel.title: [508] adding custim items? [508]
channel.description:
i really need help with adding custom items. on this server i saw they had a cape with wings on it. how can i make this on my server?? help me plzzz??? and is it possible to make items diffrent colors?? i really need help!!!!
REP++ who ever helps!!

item.title: [508] adding custim items? [508]
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

can you tell me please? i’ll make u staff just anything! lol please!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 14, 2009, 07:58:47 pm[/size][hr][quote=“OleanPkz, post:2, topic:278423”]Well I dont know about the cape/wig, but I do know Changing items colors are in the client…sorry thats all i got! lol ;)[/quote]

can you tell me please? like can i edit armour and stuff? tell me please!! thanks a lot…remeber this is for 508 ;o. if u can tell me how to change item colors, i’ll made u admin on my server…just plz…tell me…
